contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionarypar|jail}} A '''[[prison#North America|jail]]''' is a short-term detention facility in the United States and Canada. '''Jail''' may also refer to: ==Entertainment== *[[Jail (1966 film)|''Jail'' (1966 film)]], a 1966 Malayalam movie *[[Jail (film)|''Jail'' (film)]], a 2009 Bollywood movie *[[Jail (TV series)|''Jail'' (TV series)]], a reality television series *[[Jail (Monopoly)]], a space on the board game ''Monopoly'' ==Computing== *[[Jail (computer security)]], a program resources sandbox mechanism *[[Chroot jail]], a command on Unix operating systems *[[FreeBSD jail]], a FreeBSD system-level virtualization mechanism {{disambig}}
